verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
You are the Holy One
You are the Living Word
You are
The center of my focus, Jesus

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
You are the Son of God
You are the Solid Rock
You are
The center of my focus, Jesus

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Pre-Chorus:
You're the lover of my soul
And I adore You only

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Chorus:
It's all about You
All about You
It's all about You
Jesus

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
It's all about You
All about You
It's all about You
B ((E) or Intro 2 or Ending)
Jesus

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Verse 3:
You are miraculous
You are supernatural
You are
The center of my focus, Jesus

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Verse 4:
You are all powerful
You are so wonderful
You are
The center of my focus, Jesus

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Nobody else
Nobody else
Nobody else
'Cause it's all about You
(4x)
